Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2014 05:07AM pamharris1107 wrote: The Claw! That's exactly what I'm feeling. I'm 5 weeks post bi lateral mastectomy with tissue expanders and forgot my restrictions and picked my 6 year old 60 lb niece who I haven't seen since xmas as she threw herself I to my arms at the airport. I cannot believe the pain I'm in 5 days later. Thanks for sharing. I feel better knowing  I'm not the only one.
